title: From biomass to fuels: a carbon-efficient route combining ketalization and fluid catalytic cracking
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00131A, Paper
Juliana Carvalho, Alessandra Vieira, Alviclér Magalhães, Leandro S. Mariz e Miranda, Yiu Lau Lam, Marcelo M. Pereira
One of the best ways to reduce the carbon footprint is to convert second-generation biomass (s-BM) into fuels in oil refineries.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
